Override.entitydescription.smg: A very old 11.4x30mm SMG, it's design having been on Europa since humanity arrived. It's heavy lock up system severely hampers its cyclic rate and as a result it has been mostly phased out by other options, as more sophisticated bolt designs were made allowing for more reliable options to be developed.
Override.entitydescription.smgmagazine: An old 25 round 11.4x30mm magazine meant for use in the older Coalition SMGs, its shape designed for the cartridges that contain an older form of oxidizing propellant.
Override.entitydescription.smgmagazinedepletedfue: An old 25 round 11.4x30mm magazine loaded with custom Depleted Uranium projectiles for better effectiveness against armour, though has awful terminal ballistics.
Override.entitydescription.revolver: An old 9x29mm revolver using an antiquated cartridge, being the first handgun design on Europa. It has a very light double action trigger mechanism.
Override.entitydescription.revolverround: An old 9x29mm cartridge that appears to no longer be produced on Europa anymore. Despite this, it is incredibly common due to the collosal Surplus, however has sub-par capabilities compared to modern options.
Override.entitydescription.revolverrounddepletedf: An old 9x29mm cartridge, custom made to have a special DU projectile for better performance against armour, sacrificing a lot of terminal ballistics.
Override.entitydescription.shotgun: A worn and cheap 12 Gauge shotgun with a very stiff pump action, being the first of it's kind on Europa. It has been entirely phased out by contemporary options.
Override.entitydescription.shotgunshell: An 12 Gauge shotgun shell containing buckshot. Being found all across Europa, it is renowned for it's close quarters lethality despite it's non-existent armour penetration.
Override.entitydescription.shotgunslugexplosive: A shotgun slug containing explosive material. Powerful, but still somewhat inaccurate on account of being fired out of a shotgun.
Override.entitydescription.harpoongun: A very basic weapon meant for taking on common Europan denizens, however is a terrible choice for force on force combat.
Override.entitydescription.smgunique: A surplus SMG modified by the previous user, featuring a longer barrel, burst trigger group, larger gas block and a mount for either a light or scope. This was evidently customized for longer distance engagements.
Override.entitydescription.shotgununique: A very old shotgun with 2 side-by-side barrels and linked triggers, allowing for 2 shells to be discharged almost immediately. Obviously, its capacity is inferior to practically every other design.
Override.entitydescription.handcannon: A massive 15.5x50mm revolver that uses a ridiculously large cartridge, resembling a small grenade shell. It has a very heavy double action trigger mechanism.
Override.entitydescription.handcannonround: A massive 15.5x50mm cartridge with a Titanium-Alloy jacketed Physicorium core, capable of penetrating multiple enemies and causing massive damage.
Override.entitydescription.assaultrifle: A bizzare multi-calibre assault rifle that was one of the first of it's kind, chambering 5.56, 5.45, and it's own powerful 6.8x51mm cartridges.
Override.entitydescription.assaultriflemagazine: A 20 round 6.8x51mm magazine meant for the Experimental AR, using explosive-tipped rounds to destory armor and cripple targets.
Override.entitydescription.autoshotgun: A very heavy 12 gauge shotgun featuring an internal magazine and a unique automatic mechanism, capable of some serious damage against unarmoured targets.
Override.entitydescription.stungundart: A small electronic dart designed to inflict multiple short burst electric currents over a period of time into the person it sticks into, causing involuntary muscle movement and temporary paralysis.
Override.entitydescription.spear: A simple rod of steel with a sharp, barbed point on the end for use against undersea fauna.
Override.entitydescription.magnesium: An alkali metal that is popular as a propellant on Europa for various low calibre cartridges and some medicines.
Override.entitydescription.flashpowder: A mixture of metallic fuel and oxidizer, extensively used in large calibre ammunition for providing adequate chamber pressures.
Override.entitydescription.lead: A heavy metal that is easy to melt and cast with. This material is in extremely high demand due to it's use in ammunition and radiation shielding.
Override.entitydescription.grenadelauncher: A worn and old 40x46mm grenade launcher used for area denial.
Override.entitydescription.stungrenade: A less-than-lethal grenade meant to disorient aggressive individuals without causing significant harm, creating an intense bang and blinding light. It has a 1.5 second fuze.
Override.entitydescription.shotgunshellblunt: A slug made completely out of rubber, made for pain compliance and subduing troublemakers without needing other options. However due to this its a terrible choice for a person who is armed and aggressive.
Override.entitydescription.hmg: A hefty 8.6x70mm Machine Gun meant for powerful sustained fire, though it's primitive recoil system paired with the cartridge makes it extremely hard to control.
Override.entitydescription.hmgmagazine: A large 100 round 8.6x70mm Machine Gun magazine.
Override.entitydescription.rifle: An old 7.62x67mm Bolt Action Rifle with a 40mm UGL that used as a precursor to both battle and marksman rifles. It is quite often used despite it's obsolesence. A skilled Rifleman can make better use of this weapon.
Override.entitydescription.riflebullet: A 7.62x67mm FMJ cartridge, being one of the first successful prototype supercavitating options on Europa, making it ideal for long distance fauna hunting.
Override.entitydescription.machinepistol: An 11.4x30mm firearm made to bridge the gap between the Revolver and SMG, however has been phased out due to it's recoil, inaccuracy and lackluster power.
Override.entitydescription.fraggrenade: A standard issue hand grenade with a thin steel casing meant to break apart on detonation, it has a 5m explosion radius and 9m fragmentation radius.
Override.entitydescription.backpack: A custom backpack design meant to be both spacious and low profile, good for anyone needing decent storage, best for the jack of all trades.
Override.entitydescription.bodyarmor: A standard issue vest with hard armour inserts for Coalition forces, it is found almost everywhere given the proliferation of rifles.
Override.entitydescription.piratebodyarmor: A heavier rig with thicker inserts made by Separatists, it is capable of resisting rifle fire, but it falls short of it's Coalition counterparts.
Override.entitydescription.ballistichelmet1: A standard issue helmet with a visor, its focussed on providing ballistic protection, able to shrug off pistol shots and some rifle cartridges though is awful for blunt hits.
Override.entitydescription.ballistichelmet2: A soft armour helmet made for submarine gunners, being significantly less obtrusive when manning periscopes whilst retaining some form of protection.
Override.entitydescription.ballistichelmet3: A solid helmet with a visor, made for withstanding bladed and blunt impacts and is an excellent choice for melee combat, though is incapable of protecting against bullets.
Override.afflictiondescription.gunshotwound: The patient has been shot with a firearm, a bullet sized entry wound is visible alongside a significantly larger exit wound, showing a nasty mess of blood and torn tissue.
Override.afflictiondescription.gunshotwound.low: The patient has been shot with a firearm, the projectile having hit mostly elastic tissues and showing little signs of cavitation or tumbling.
Override.entitydescription.bandolier: A lightweight adjustable overvest meant to be placed over armour for increasing ammo capacity, being superior for mobility than backpacks.
Override.entitydescription.40mmnuke: A 40x46mm grenade housing a heavy yet small low yield fission warhead, being significantly more powerful than conventional explosives.
Override.entitydescription.molotovcoctail: An improvised incendiary device that can be easily made for a quick bonfire, though it's effect is lackluster and takes some time to engulf a room.
Override.disembarkperkdescription.armorysmall: The armory contains basic weapons, such as Light SMGs, Revolvers, and Handguns. Uses Coalition Arms.
Override.disembarkperkdescription.armoryclosequar: The armory contains close quarters weapons, such as Shotguns, Heavy SMGs, and Light Rifles. Uses Coalition Arms.
Override.disembarkperkdescription.armorylongrange: Expands the armory with surplus long-range weaponry, such as Rifles and Experimental Assault Rifles.
Override.disembarkperkdescription.armorypeacekeep: Adds stun guns and stun grenades to the armory.
